CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 17, 1963, pg. C8, reads: "Monarchs in New Uniforms - Thank to an anonymous donor, who apparently gets a kick out of seeing youngsters working together, at a common cause, the Pittsburgh Monarchs baseball entry is seen sporting new uniforms... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Monarchs baseball team, including first row from left: unknown man, Alvin Muldrow, Larry Bryant, Ronald Jackson, unknown, Thomas Bold, John Williams, Tyrone Scott, bat boy Gregory Benton; second row: unknown, Robert Perry, Rainey Benson, unknown, John Jackson, two unknowns, John Gobble, Kenneth Spencer, Louis or Lewis Johnson, James Colvin, and manager Alberta Broaden, posed on street corner
